title: Ewoma Etemire

my.name: Ewoma Zino
my.text: Specialise in flutter apps and Web development.

web.name: Web Apps
web.text: Building and designing a responsive website.

logoIntro.text: I create art, not just product.

webText.p1: Over the years, I have successfully designed multiple websites from scratch. My designs are responsive and functional, for businesses and individual purpose.
webText.p2: Take some time to view and experience my work.

appText.p1: After perfecting myself in the art of web development, I went into the area of app development, and after several lessons of app development. I saw the art in coding.
appText.p2: You can easily download and install them on your device.

otherText.p1: Aside from coding, I also have other interest, Kind of like photography.

about.topic: All you need to know about me.
about.who_am_i: I am the next big thing!
what_i_do: I am a professional web developer. I have been designing websites for quite a while now
I am also a Flutter App developer. I have built and launched many Flutter Apps.
about_charges: I create art, not just product.
My charges are standard and affordable.

teamUp.topic: Looking for help with your project?
teamUp.p1: Do not hold back to team up with me if you need assistance with your project. We can team up, and together we can complete your project.
teamUp.p2: Or maybe you like it when I do all the work? I got no problem with that. Team up with me and see it done.
teamUp.p3: I can also help with your school project involving coding problems, be it C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, Python, Dart, CSS, and HTML.

footer: This website was designed by Ewoma Etemire. to display his projects.
